sqlMap.select: SELECT SEQ, REFERENCE_KEY, CR_NUMBER, ID, REQ_QUERY, EXE_QUERY, PR_KEY, BEFORE_RESULT, AFTER_RESULT, CREATE_TIME, PR_ROWID FROM DELGER_HISTORY WHERE REFERENCE_KEY = #seq# ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT a.*, b.email AS userID FROM ledger_head a, tadpole_user b WHERE a.user_seq = b.seq AND b.email like #strUser# AND a.cp_seq like #crNumber# ORDER BY create_time DESC
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO ledger_head (user_seq, cp_seq, comment, request_query) VALUES (#user_seq#, #cp_seq#, #comment#, #request_query#);
SELECT max(seq) seq FROM ledger_head WHERE user_seq = #user_seq#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ledger_head SET result_yn = #result_yn# ,result_msg = #result_msg# WHERE seq = #seq#
